Name: CyberDrifter
About the game: CYBERDRIFTER ENTER CYBERSPACE IN VIRTUAL REALTY! Just as the global pandemic of 2020 was eradicated a new virus was unleashed into computer systems that threatened global communications worldwide. A new task force was assembled of military & tech specialists that can enter systems virtually to eradicate the virus in an assimilated world. They are the CyberDrifters. Key features: Main Mission - Enter Cyberspace armed with your gravity blaster & data disc to eradicate an electronic virus in a virtual world! Make use of your Cyber-cycle, tank & glider when the need arises - Smooth locomotion & blink/dash teleport movement available. Arcade levels - Destroy the bots and compete across the globe for a place on the hi-score leaderboard. Disc throwing mini-game Original SynthWave music by Nicole Marie T LIV Mixed Reality capture supported Build 0.6 is now available! New Grav-gun, updated visuals, enemies & gameplay! ( 0.6 currently contains a tutorial and Arcade level 1 ) Build 0.5 containing 5 pre-update Arcade levels is available in the Beta branch which can be accessed by right clicking on Cyberdrifter in your Steam library, clicking on properties, then click Beta tab and then selecting beta build1 ---
